title: WTB: A couple of Cycle Backs
author: rocarroll

posts.post_title: WTB: A couple of Cycle Backs
posts.post_content:
I was thumbing through my cards this morning and realized I have very few Cycle's.  I'd like to add a couple but nothing big.  Does anyone have any Cycle's they are looking to sell.  I prefer SGC graded looking for a grade of 30 or 40.  Would consider raw as long as it would grade out at that.  Budget is $65-$85 per card or somewhere around that.  

Let me know if you have anything. Thanks!

Bump.  Still looking for Cycle backs graded 30 or 40 or raw that would grade at that.  If anyone has any commons I'd like to pick up one or two.  Just let me know what your asking price is.  

Also, would like to pick a Durham in similar grade, back not important.
